abi: event CampaignAmountWithdraw(uint256 campaignId, uint256 goalAmount, uint256 timestamp)
event CampaignStarted(address indexed beneficiary, uint256 goalAmount, uint256 deadline, uint256 timestamp)
event Contribution(address indexed contributor, uint256 indexed campaignId, uint256 amount, uint256 timestamp)
event GoalAchieved(uint256 indexed campaignId, uint256 goalAmount, uint256 amountCollected, uint256 timestamp)
event Refund(address indexed contributor, uint256 indexed campaignId, uint256 refundAmount, uint256 timestamp)
